title: Baked Honey Mustard Chicken Recipe
description: This honey mustard chicken is a quick and easy baked chicken breast recipe full of flavor from a tangy-sweet honey mustard glaze with dried herbs.

Chicken Baked Honey Mustard Chicken 4.3 (3,088) 2,077 Reviews 249 Photos This honey mustard chicken is quick and easy to prepare, and the kids love it, too! Submitted by Mary Annthipie Bane Updated on November 15, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 249 249 249 249 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 45 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings cooking spray 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves salt and pepper to taste ½ cup honey ½ cup prepared mustard 1 teaspoon dried basil 1 teaspoon paprika ½ teaspoon dried parsley Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place in the prepared baking dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine honey, mustard, basil, paprika, and parsley in a small bowl; mix well. Pour 1/2 of the honey mustard mixture over chicken and brush to cover. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Turn chicken pieces over and brush with remaining honey mustard mixture. Continue baking until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear, 10 to 15 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Let cool 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 5,263 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Baked Honey Mustard Chicken 01 of 249 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 249 Photo by  TxCin2 03/06/2025 This was a fast and easy dinner. Anytime you've got dinner on the table in half an hour it's a bonus. The basil or paprika (or both), gave this an odd taste which I didn't care for. My husband liked this just fine and gobbled it all up. He said it was delicious. I probably won't make this one again, but I enjoyed trying out a new recipe. It was okay, just not suited to my preference. 03 of 249 Photo by  BluePecan1121 06/15/2023 I like everything about it, easy to make. 04 of 249 Photo by  BoldSpud2955 02/26/2023 Great recipe! Wasn't sure what "prepared mustard" meant so I guessed and went with basic yellow mustard. Tastes great, thanks for posting the recipe! 05 of 249 Photo by  dorisfrench 12/23/2022 I made chicken legs. First I marinated them in some pineapple juice mixed with some water in the fridge for 2 hours. Then I made the sauce all with fresh ingredients. The salt and pepper on the chicken before putting on the sauce was good, gave a good flavor. I just cooked it on 350F for 50 min (covered with foil). Also I just coated the chicken with sauce and poured on the sauce onto it before cooking.Then 10 min at 425 with no cover.Turned out really well. My only complaint is there wasn't enough! Next time I will use chicken breasts. 06 of 249 Photo by  Christina Burns 07/19/2022 Very easy to make and gave my kitchen a nice smell. Was very delicious!!!! 07 of 249 Photo by  HtownHeff 06/24/2021 08 of 249 Photo by  Gail 04/02/2021 Used skinless thighs! 09 of 249 Photo by  Eddie 03/19/2021 3.5 Nice dish. Good. Thought it might be great. Might have to try some of the recommended tweaks. 10 of 249 Photo by  Craig Harris 03/17/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Garlic and Rosemary Chicken 239 Ratings Baked Chicken with Peaches 376 Ratings Island Chicken with Fruit Salsa 39 Ratings Spicy Chicken Breasts 704 Ratings Herbed Chicken Nuggets 297 Ratings Gina's Lemon Pepper Chicken 210 Ratings Broiled Chicken Breasts with Herbs, Carrots, and Red Potatoes 32 Ratings Unbelievable Chicken 2,423 Ratings Easy Garlic Ginger Chicken 110 Ratings Chicken with Garlic, Basil, and Parsley 666 Ratings RamJam Chicken 390 Ratings Country Style Barbecued Chicken 120 Ratings Chicken Creole 102 Ratings Apricot Glazed Chicken 143 Ratings Cinnamon Chicken 111 Ratings Garlic Chicken And Grapes 112 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
